name: El diablo que me hizo llorar
name_original: El diablo que me hizo llorar
description:
What would happen if we mix Blasphemous with Devil May Cry and MadWorld? THIS GAME

This mini game is a part of my other game Spanish Hangover

Game mechanics

Kill as many lost souls as posible without getting hurt by the Big Ben and the rolling baby head.


Controls

Move = keyboard arrows, controller joystick
Attack = keyboard space, playstation square
Roll = keyboard B, playstation circle


Assets

- Low Poly Penitent One Blasphemous - innovational_dummy
- Big ben - artparasite
- Crybaby Mask - Shao
- Zombie_P03 - Zeruri
- Anime speed lines shader - Mirza Beig



- This is just a fan game.
- Blasphemous is a game and trademark of The Game Kitchen / Team17.
- MadWorld is a game and trademark of PlatinumGames / Sega.
- Devil May Cry is a game and trademark of Capcom.
